content: go to crochet baby shower blanket the go to crochet baby shower blanket is part a quick crochet blanket project this baby blanket is sure to make your gift the hit of the shower the baby blanket can be made in any color so it works for boys girl and gender neutral anytime i need a fast project i grab my ombre yarn and use this stitch pattern and i have a project that will be perfect for baby and transitions great for the toddler extra credit pattern for bicrafty bootcamp crochet lessons for knitter s
